title.rendered: Virtual Fair Office Hours- Join Us!

content.rendered:
Do you and your team have questions about the best way to host a virtual fair on Handshake? You’re not alone—and we’re here to help.

Join us on Thursdays at 11am PT/2pm ET to ask your questions about how to host a virtual career fair in Handshake—while you’re at it, learn from your peers about how they are strategizing their fairs this Fall semester.

To join, click on this Zoom link.

Virtual fair office hours will take place on:

  • Thursday, June 25th
  • Thursday, July 2nd
  • Thursday, July 9th
  • Thursday, July 16th
  • Thursday, July 23rd – watch recording
  • Thursday, July 30th – watch recording
  • Note: there will be no office hours on Thursday, August 6th because we will be holding a virtual fair training webinar
  • Thursday, August 13th – watch recording, review Villanova’s resources
  • Thursday, August 20th – watch recording
  • Thursday, August 27th – watch recording
  • Thursday, September 3rd
  • Thursday, September 10th
  • Thursday, September 17th
  • Thursday, September 24th
  • Thursday, October 1st
  • Thursday, October 8th
  • Thursday, October 15th
  • Thursday, October 22nd
  • Thursday, October 29th

excerpt.rendered: Join us for weekly office hours to ask questions and learn new virtual fair strategies.
